tree.text: It's a large rune, with something enscribed upon it...

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "It's official, the guild of the Ironspears is breaking apart."

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "This is ridiculous! The Lucosa have proven to be untrustable, and yet my fellow Ruirui want to try peace!"

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "It will all fall apart again, I know it. It always does. Hopefully, when it happens, my kind can fight back as necessary."

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "If the war has started again as you find this, take this Power Orb. Find the others, and your power will be unbeatable."
